sentences.en: He doesn't fit the national stereotype of a Frenchman.
sentences.cn: 他不是个符合法国模式的法国人.

sentences.en: He was stereotyped by some as a renegade.
sentences.cn: 他被一些人带着成见视为一名叛逆者。

sentences.en: He's my stereotype of a schoolteacher.
sentences.cn: 他是我心目中的典型教师.

sentences.en: I am well aware that we all conform to one stereotype or another.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都能找到某种与自己相似的模式化形象，这一点我很清楚。

sentences.en: I don't think you can stereotype this issue as being Black - and - white.
sentences.cn: 我认为你不能要黑要么白地刻板地去考虑这件事.

sentences.en: It's wrong to stereotype people, as if they were all alike.
sentences.cn: 把人们看作都是一样的,这是错误的.

sentences.en: Many men feel their body shape doesn't live up to the stereotype of the ideal man.
sentences.cn: 很多男人都觉得自己的体形不符合人们心目中惯有的理想男性形象。

sentences.en: Or, what Stanford University psychologist Claude M. Steele, who is black, refers to as'stereotype vulnerability.
sentences.cn: 或者, 用斯坦福大学的黑人心理学家克劳迪-M-斯蒂尔的话说, 这是一种“定型的脆弱性”.

sentences.en: Stereotype ( Stereo ) : A duplicate relief plate for letterpress printing.
sentences.cn: 铅铸版: 活版印刷用的复制版.

sentences.en: Stereotype and individualization are two different arts of characterization.
sentences.cn: 摘要类型化和个性化是两种不同的人物塑造手法.

sentences.en: That was the old stereotype and the old dogma.
The classic MIt'stereotype, right out of his parents'dreams.
sentences.cn: 一副典型的麻省理工学生形象, 和他父母期望他的样子相去甚远.

sentences.en: There's always been a stereotype about successful businessmen.
sentences.cn: 人们对于成功商人一直都有一种固定印象。

sentences.en: These are the new stereotype and the new dogma.
sentences.cn: 这些就都是新八股、新教条.

sentences.en: They unfortunately become the target of the stereotype and discrimination.
sentences.cn: 他们不幸的成为歧视和成见的目标.

sentences.en: TV critics said the program exploited the stereotype of the overbearing mamma.
sentences.cn: 电视评论说此节目利用了专横妈妈们的一贯做派.

words.tran_cn: 用铅版印刷的；老一套的
把…浇铸成铅版；使成为陈规（stereotype的过去分词）
消毒，杀菌；使成不毛；使绝育；使不起作用

trans.tran_cn: 固定不变的，陈规旧套的，铅板（印刷）的
刻板印象，模式化观念（或形象），老一套
trans.tran_en: a belief or idea of what a particular type of person or thing is like. Stereotypes are often unfair or untrue.

trans.tran_cn: 使用铅版；套用老套，使一成不变
对…形成模式化（或类型化）的看法，对…存有成见，把…浇铸成铅版
